snippet: In a video report released by Human Rights Watch on Tuesday, former detainees, one of them a 14-year-old boy, described the abuse they said they were subjected to by the Syrian security forces.
abstract: In a video report released by Human Rights Watch on Tuesday, former detainees, one of them a 14-year-old boy, described the abuse they said they were subjected to by the Syrian security forces.

headline.main: Protesters Describe Torture by Syrian Security Forces
